directions: Divide tangerines or small oranges among 6 tumblers. Add 2 teaspoons sugar and 1/2 teaspoon grated peeled ginger to each glass. Crush the ingredients in the bottom of the glass with a muddler or handle of a wooden spoon. Top each drink with 2 tablespoons tangerine juice and 1/4 cup cachaa (Brazilian sugarcane liquor) or vodka. Fill glasses with ice cubes, stir, and serve.
ingredients: 3 small chopped seeded tangerines or small oranges (no need to peel)
1 1/2 cup cachaça (Brazilian sugarcane liquor) or vodka
title: Tangerine-Ginger Caipirinhas
